content.rendered:
The European Association of ERASMUS Coordinators (EAEC), the European Association of Career Guidance (EACG) and the THALES Foundation announce the 3rd Academic University Student Conference (ASTUCON 2019). The Academic Student Conference is designed to provide an opportunity for university students to participate in a conference either through presenting their own work or projects or theses, or through attending presentations of other students. Poster presentations are also welcome.

University Professors and Companies are welcome to offer workshops for university students during this event. The aim of the Conference is to promote the sharing of work and research between university students, connect with other groups with which they have a shared interest and thereby promote communication and cooperation between students from different universities and countries.

ASTUCON 2019 is organized under the national auspices of Dr. Kostas Hambiaouris, Minister of Education and Culture of Cyprus and under the Municipal auspices of the Mayor of Paphos, Mr Phedon Phedonos.

Read More : ASTUCON 2019
